General.Name: Alandalus Property Co.
General.Description: Alandalus Property Company engages in the commercial real estate investment and development activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It constructs, owns, and manages malls, commercial, and residential centres and complexes. The company is also involved in the general contracting of residential and commercial buildings, educational, recreational, health institutions, roads, dams, water and sewage project, electrical, and mechanical work; and maintain and operates real estate properties, buildings, and commercial complexes. In addition, it develops, owns, and invest in lands and real estate properties. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 6708 Northern Ring Branch Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 13313
